overview: Emma Hix and Haley Reed rush into Emma's bedroom, closing the door quickly behind them as they hop up onto the bed. After refusing to try that special stuff, Emma talks about something that can make them feel even better, clumsily miming masturbation. Gia Derza and Maya Kendrick are having a snooze together in bed. Suddenly Gia snaps awake and rouses Maya, telling her fearfully that she had a nightmare and that she's scared of the dark. As the girls chat and laugh about all the silly things that they're afraid of, they get closer to each other.
title: Say Yes to Pussy!
